Class CommandManager

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.controller.CommandManager
public class CommandManager extends Object
The CommandManager class is responsible for managing the execution, undoing, and redoing of commands in the Command design pattern. It maintains two stacks to track the executed commands and undone commands, enabling seamless undo and redo functionality.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Stack<Command>
    commandStack
    Stack to store executed commands for potential undo operations.
    private Stack<Command>
    undoStack
    Stack to store undone commands for potential redo operations.

    Executes a given command, adds it to the command stack, and clears the undo stack.
    Command

    Retrieves the last executed command without removing it from the command stack.
    void
    redo()
    Redoes the last undone command, moving it back to the command stack.
    void
    resetCommandStack()
    Clears both the command stack and the undo stack, resetting the command history.
    void
    undo()
    Undoes the last executed command, moving it to the undo stack.

  • Field Details

    • commandStack

      private Stack<Command> commandStack
      Stack to store executed commands for potential undo operations.

    • undoStack

      private Stack<Command> undoStack
      Stack to store undone commands for potential redo operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommandManager

      public CommandManager()

  • Method Details

    • executeCommand

      public void executeCommand(Command command)
      Executes a given command, adds it to the command stack, and clears the undo stack.
      Parameters:
      command - the Command to be executed

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Undoes the last executed command, moving it to the undo stack. If there are no commands to undo, this method does nothing.

    • getLastCommand

      public Command getLastCommand()
      Retrieves the last executed command without removing it from the command stack.
      Returns:
      the last executed Command, or null if the stack is empty

    • redo

      public void redo()
      Redoes the last undone command, moving it back to the command stack. If there are no commands to redo, this method does nothing.

    • resetCommandStack

      public void resetCommandStack()
      Clears both the command stack and the undo stack, resetting the command history.
